details.purpose: Zur Dokumentation klinischer Diagnosen mit optionalen diagnostischen Kriterien und Dringlichkeiten. Erfordert kodierten Eintrag der Diagnosen.
details.use: Zur Dokumentation beliebiger fr端herer oder aktueller Diagnosen - also zur Dokumentation des fr端heren Verlaufs oder der aktuellen Diagnosen. Kann zur Dokumentation der Diagnosen wechselnder Patienten genutzt werden, also zur Familienanamnese.

details.purpose: For recording medical diagnoses with optional diagnostic criteria and staging. Requires coded entry of diagnosis.
details.use: Used for recording any diagnosis, present or past - so is used for recording past history as well as current diagnoses. Used with changed 'Subject of care' for recording diagnoses in relatives and so for family history.

translations.author: Jasmin Buck, Sebastian Garde
University of Heidelberg, Central Queensland University

Ein Problem, ein Zustand oder Sachverhalt definiert von einem Kliniker, der als zusammenfassend f端r eine Menge von Symptomen oder Anliegen der Person erachtet wird und dieses sinnvoll bezeichnet

Ein Problem oder ein Hinweis auf ein Problem oder eine Verletzung, an anderer Stelle in der EPA dokumentiert ist
Gruppierung von Informationen 端ber individuelle Vorkommen oder Verschlimmerungen
Die H辰ufigkeit der individuellen Vorkommen des Problems

Ein Problem, das die Folge des angezeigten Problems ist
provisional diagnosis considered likely and a basis for proceeding with management
working diagnosis considered very likely but not yet confirmed
The criteria on which the diagnosis is based
The stage of the disease by clinical assessment
The stage of the disease (not TNM staging)
The extent of invasion of local tissue
No clinical assessment of the primary tumour made
No primary tumour is evident clinically
The malignant cells are confined to their usual cellular region
Tumour invading to full thickness (or border) of structure
Tumour has spread outside the structure in which it arose
Extent of involvement of regional nodes
No clinical assessment of regional nodes made
No clinical evidence of regional node involvement
Clinical assessment indicates that regional nodes are involved
No clinical evidence of distanct metastases
A problem, condition or issue defined by a clinician which is deemed summative of a range of symptoms or concerns of the person and a useful label of these.
A diagnosis defined by a clinician which is coded in an accepted terminology and may include the stage of the condition and the diagnostic criteria
The index problem, condition or issue described
The date that the problem began causing symptoms or signs
The age of the at the onset of the problem
The severity of the index problem
The severity of the index problem is mild, not affecting life or longevity
The severity of the index problem is such as to cause significant morbidity
The severity of the index problem has had a major effect on life and/or longevity
Description of the clinical aspects of the problem
Date the problem was recognised by clinicians
Location of the problem in terms of body site
A free text description of the location - may be in addition to a coded body site
Agents or Factors known to have been of aetiological significance
Microbial or other agent known to have caused this problem
A problem or link to a problem or injury described elsewhere in the EHR
Grouping of information about individual occurrences or exacerbations
The frequency of individual occurrences of the problem
The date of the last occurrence or exacerbation
Information about one occurrence or exacerbation
A description of the exacerbation or occurrence
Outcome of the occurrence or exacerbation
Date of onset of occurrence or exacerbation
Number of times this problem has occurred or been apparent
Complications that are attributed to this problem
A group of characteristics of the problem complicating the index condition in this archetype
Details of the problem as text or coded text or URI
The date that the problem resolved or went into remission
The age of the at the resolution of the problem
Reference to material about this condition
Useful information on the internet about this condition
Date of the resolution of the occurrence
Problems that are closely related to this problem having a common aetiology or consequent aetiology
Problem with common or consequent aetiology
A problem which is related to the index problem through common aetiology
A problem that is a consequence of the index problem
Ausdruck, der eine Diagnose in einer anerkannten Terminologie ist
Beliebiger Ausdruck der eine Diagnose ist
Beliebiger Ausdruck, der eine K旦rperstelle beschreibt
Any term that is a diagnosis in an accepted terminology
